title: Endless Space 2
notes: After the opening screen finishes loading, the menu music plays, but the game hangs. In my case, the entire computer hangs, so it might not just be proton.

title: Endless Space 2
notes: Boots "loads" until the music starts playing... then nothing. Locks up the ENTIRE computer.

title: Endless Space 2
notes:
20-30 turns into game interface stops responding to player input and process has to be killed manually.
Game logs show that AI engine has encountered fatal error and timeouts. Game session can be loaded from autosave, ai crash will happen eventually again.
specs: Intel Core i5 7300HQ , Nvidia Geforce 1050 mobile

title: Endless Space 2
notes: absolutely perfect. Played (saved and reloaded) MP with friend (on Win10) without any issues for ~4h

title: Endless Space 2
notes: Installed and ran. Game worked with zero issues. Played a multiplayer game with a friend running the game in Windows.

title: Endless Space 2
notes: Need more test time ( just 30 min tested but it work fine )

title: endless space 2
notes: there is no cutscenes (race prologue, set an outpost, etc), no background on status screen (empire screen, economy screen, etc), i think if you set animation to 4x or playing too fast i don't know which may break the game, the game turn will not end and stuck i guess it's stuck on autosave each turn, overall it's playable

title: Endless Space 2
notes: Works perfectly. The backgrounds of the F1, F2, etc -screens don't work (black, etc). Sometimes their popup-menus don't disappear, they only get half transparent. Multiplayer works (I played with someone who is using Windows 10)

"Runs" for a few turns at most with some menu graphical glitches.  Not marking as 'bronze' because you realistically can't finish a game a handful turns at a time.
Likes to unrecoverable-y freeze whenever it wants.
1/5 starts will fail.
Decent amount of graphical glitches in the in-game menus.
Performance kinda meh when it's not crashing my computer.
As part of the freezing, it's impossible to exit the game without terminating it with htop or somehting. Sometimes holds window manager hostage.


Needs a *little* bit of work before it can be recommend.
title: Endless Space® 2

notes:
Game runs but irrecoverably freezes every few turns. May be coincidental but I noticed it freezes when selecting a fleet. Graphics are mostly fine but stutter a little.
It's only "playable" if you don't mind killing the frozen process and restoring from the turn's autosave.
title: Endless Space® 2

notes: Could not alt-tab unless full screen was disabled for border-less window
title: Endless Space® 2

notes: Sometimes the background from the F-menus is buggy, sometimes their popup menus doesn't disappear, they only get half transparent

title: Endless Space® 2

notes: Performance was on par with Windows. Started a single player game with 5 opponents. I played the Unfallen. I played for roughly an hour and completed several turns without any problems. During playing, I had no issues whatsoever (like glitches, flickering, transparency issues, etc.)
title: Endless Space® 2

notes: The game works without problems, but it stopped when I closed.
